revised_title: Vacuum Wave-Length Measurements in the Ultra-Violet Spectrum of Isotope Neon-20: A Review
tldr: The authors conducted vacuum wave-length measurements of 21 lines in the spectrum of isotope neon-20 using a reflecting echelon interferometer. Their measurements, which were supported by examining inter-level differences, were expressed to eight significant figures. The results provide a third determination in the region 3370 to 3755 A, as required by the International Astronomical Union for the use of these lines as secondary standards.
